shows.title: Panel: Roswell vs. Washington State
shows.guests: Toby Martinez, Paul Semones, Steve Edmiston, Vince Ynzunza, Jason Mattson
shows.first_half: In a special panel show hosted by Connie Willis (info), it's Roswell vs. Washington state in the legendary year of 1947! A team from Roswell-- reporter Toby Martinez and investigator Paul Semones, along with a team from Washington state-- writer & attorney Steve Edmiston, filmmaker Vince Ynzunza, and museum director Jason Mattson will debate and compare notes on UFOs and strange occurrences.
shows.second_half: 6-10pm PT: Art Bell: Somewhere in Time returns to 2/21/97 when Dr. Steven Greer discussed the beginnings of the Disclosure Project, and Mel Waters of 'Mel's Hole' shared an update.

shows.title: ETs, Psychic Phenomena, & UAPs
shows.guests: Micah Hanks, Darcy Weir, John Priestland
shows.first_half: First Half: Joining George Knapp, author and podcaster Micah Hanks shares his research on all things extraterrestrial. Followed by filmmaker Darcy Weir talking about his latest project that delves into the history of ESP and psychics, uncovering their fascinating connection to UFO phenomena and the broader story of non-human intelligence.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Physicist and management consultant John Priestland will discuss uNHIdden, a non-profit set up to support people affected by UAPs in terms of their mental or physical health.

shows.title: Irrational Beliefs / Near-Death Experiences
shows.first_half: First Half: Professor of Psychology and Behavioral Economics Dan Ariely will discuss the origins of beliefs and irrational tendencies in our decision-making process. He'll delve into such topics as the inability to understand other people, the choices we make about money, and the useless fights we have with our significant others.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Dr. Jeffrey Long is a full-time Radiation Oncology physician practicing in Kentucky and a prominent researcher of near-death experiences (NDEs). He'll detail what an NDE is, how it differs from dreams or hallucinations, and will give us highlights from his research, including compelling veridical perception cases and children’s reports.

shows.title: Natural Remedies / Soul Guidance
shows.first_half: First Half: Naturopathic doctor Randi Shannon discusses the various ways we can utilize natural remedies to support our health and address ailments, in addition to incorporating modern medicine. Dr. Shannon believes that supplementation and natural remedies are essential when it comes to everyday health.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and medium Carole Obley will share insights on navigating challenging times using guidance from one’s soul. She will help us to understand the bridge between Heaven and Earth, as well as offer grief support and teachings regarding the afterlife.

shows.title: Intelligent Design / Disclosure & ETs
shows.first_half: First Half: Board-certified internist and lecturer Geoffrey Simmons will discuss multiple facets of Intelligent Design, as well as aspects of consciousness, and his thoughts about Darwin and what he didn't know. According to Simmons, consciousness cannot evolve through evolution.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Scholar Michael Salla has taught at universities in the U.S. and Australia. He'll comment on the slow UFO disclosure process, and share his contention that there have been classified extraterrestrial-related projects occurring since the 1940s. He'll also report on whistleblower testimonies given at U.S. congressional hearings.

shows.title: Strange Physics & Giza Plateau / Bigfoot Phenomena
shows.first_half: First Half: Engineer Christopher Dunn delves into the work of Dr. Friedemann Freund and his findings about the underlying physics behind earthquake lights. Dunn will also discuss recent discoveries of structures under the Giza Plateau and how they could provide insight into harnessing vast amounts of energy from the earth.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Researcher William Sheehan reports on Bigfoot phenomena, including a variety of sightings and encounters. He'll probe natural and supernatural explanations, and look at older, historical data regarding Bigfoot's existence, including tribal history and a possible UFO connection.

shows.title: The Other Side / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Paranormal investigator Chip Coffey will discuss the Other Side, what happens when we get there, and what we can do on Earth to help us on our journey. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give George Noory a call and share experiences, weird tales, or whatever is on your mind!
